articles.title: 9-Month Limit On Covid Vaccine Validity For Travel To Europe In New Rules - NDTV
articles.description: The European Union is recommending a 9-month time limit for the validity of Covid-19 vaccinations for travel into and within the bloc and also is proposing to prioritize vaccinated travelers.

articles.title: Strong earthquake of 6.1 magnitude strikes India-Myanmar border region - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The quake was felt in Chittagong in Bangladesh and as far away as Kolkata in eastern India, according to witness accounts posted on European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre’s (EMSC) website and by users on Twitter.
articles.content:
A shallow and strong earthquake of magnitude 6.1 struck the Myanmar-India border region early on Friday, Indias National Center for Seismology said.
